column1: Smoque BBQ////Smoque was solid.  It didn't knock my socks off the way the reviews and line to get in suggest
column2: but it was definitely solid and I'd go again.  You do wait a while in line
column3: but once you get in it's counter service
column4: so you're eating right away.  It's BYOB
column5: so if you drink a few while you're waiting in line
column6: it's just like a normal restaurant
column7: except you have to stand up until the point when your food comes.  Go on a nice day though
column8: cause a chunk of the line is outside.
